title: Terms and Conditions
description: Template for a standard Terms and Conditions document

fields.title: General Terms
fields.description: Standard terms applicable to all users or customers, Basic rules and guidelines for using the service or product

list.title: Important Conditions
list.description: Key conditions that users must be aware of, Critical terms that have a significant impact on users' rights and responsibilities

list.title: Unusual or Dangerous Conditions
list.description: Any conditions that are uncommon or pose potential risks, Terms that may involve significant obligations, risks, or limitations, try to understand from the context what i need to be afraid of

list.title: Governing Law
list.description: The legal jurisdiction under which the terms and conditions are governed
